name: Wickes
overview:
Wickes has around 180 stores throughout the UK and this success was founded by Sean Oâ€™Boyle, an Irish Immigrant in the USA in 1854 and in 1972 the company Wickes along with British building merchant, Sankeys opened its first store in the UK. This founded success which still continues today throughout the whole of the UK is due to the all year round low prices and welcoming customer service skills making Wickes a number one DIY store throughout the country.

Wickes is an almost self-service DIY store offering everything from kitchen sinks, garden plant pots and wood flooring. It has a huge range of tools on offer all ready for you to take away on the same day. Wickes also offers a great â€˜take-awayâ€™ service providing bigger items such as; kitchens and bathrooms also available to â€˜take-awayâ€™ the same day. Wickes provides on-site helpful staff that will assist you on any queries regarding tools and equipment. The staffs are also very well trained to help you with your own DIY troubles such as; painting over a rough wall or potting plants that never seem to grow. Obtaining professional advice is a standard policy with Wickes, making sure the customer is happy and that they have answered any problems.

Wickes values their customers loyalty and commitment to their stores and they are rewarding this behaviour with a loyalty card. This card is called MyCard and it will entitle you to exclusive money off deals and discounts tailored to your needs as a consumer. MyCard rewards every pound with one point, whether you have ordered in-store, online or via the catalogue. The point system ultimately changes depending on how much you spend, to find out more about the point system visit www.mywickescard.co.uk where MyCard is clearly explained.

Wickes offers a professional service providing, materials, tools, advice and solutions for both your Kitchen and Bathroom. Wickes has two great websites offering everything you would need to fit a new fully furnished Kitchen or Bathroom. Wickes offers a wonderful team of designers providing free design consultations to help you obtain the perfect kitchen/bathroom. Therefore rather than worry about the cost you can worry about the actual implementation of the kitchen/bathroom. To find out more about this offer and all there is about kitchen and bathrooms with Wickes visit; www.wickesbathrooms.co.uk and www.wickeskitchens.co.uk. Alternatively you can go in-store and a helpful member of staff will be able to show you what Wickes offers.

â€œ Very satisfied with my bathroom suite, the quality is better than suites costing twice as much. Excellent service. â€

â€”By Ello from Bridgend South Wales.

The Wickes website is a great addition to the Wickes family it gives the consumer more freedom and choice when it comes to purchasing your desired products. Wickes online offers a great service allowing you to complete most DIY tasks from the comfort of your home. You can order online and have delivery of goods the next-working day. Alternatively you can opt to seek help and advice online from both professional tradesmen and the general public. This is a vast improvement for the stores as it allows the consumer to take help and advice all year round and at any time of the day, meaning those late nights completing the new nursery will continue due to the Wickes online service. Wickes provides the whole package therefore if you want to lay new flooring in your home then Wickes can offer it all from, wood flooring, underlay, polish, beading and anything else you may require to complete the DIY job.
